name: RetrieveVercelAlias
description:
Retrieve Vercel alias information for a host name or alias ID.

Use this tool to fetch alias details for a specified host name or alias ID on Vercel.

parameters.name: alias_identifier
parameters.description: The alias or alias ID of the Vercel entity to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The alias or alias ID to be retrieved

parameters.name: created_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve the alias only if it was created after the specified timestamp (in milliseconds).

value_schema.description: Get the alias only if it was created after the provided timestamp

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Fetch the alias only if it is associated with this project ID in Vercel.

value_schema.description: Get the alias only if it is assigned to the provided project ID

parameters.name: after_timestamp
parameters.description: Get the alias only if it was created after this JavaScript timestamp (milliseconds since epoch).

value_schema.description: Get the alias only if it was created after this JavaScript timestamp

parameters.name: created_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve the alias only if it was created before this JavaScript timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get the alias only if it was created before this JavaScript timestamp

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of. This specifies the team context for the alias retrieval.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Get the alias only if it was created after the provided timestamp

value_schema.description: Get the alias only if it was created after the provided timestamp

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Get the alias only if it is assigned to the provided project ID

value_schema.description: Get the alias only if it is assigned to the provided project ID

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Get the alias only if it was created after this JavaScript timestamp

value_schema.description: Get the alias only if it was created after this JavaScript timestamp

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Get the alias only if it was created before this JavaScript timestamp

value_schema.description: Get the alias only if it was created before this JavaScript timestamp

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrAlias
parameters.description: The alias or alias ID to be retrieved

value_schema.description: The alias or alias ID to be retrieved
